description: It seems things are getting pretty serious between Amy Schumer and Ben Hanisch as the couple have become parents...to a pet dog - she posted a pic of the pair on Instagram on Wednesday.
title: Amy Schumer reveals she has a dog with boyfriend Ben Hanisch
title_page: Amy Schumer reveals she has a dog with boyfriend Ben Hanisch | Daily Mail Online
text:
They have been dating for a matter of months.
But it seems things are getting pretty serious between Amy Schumer and Ben Hanisch as the couple have become parents...to a pet dog.
The actress posted a photo of herself and her beau on Wednesday holding an adorable pooch.
'It's a girl': Amy Schumer posted a photo of herself and her beau Ben Hanisch on Wednesday holding an adorable pooch
She captioned the shot: 'It's a girl.'
They both looked delighted as they cuddled the cutie.
The pair have been getting busy on social media recently - on Tuesday Ben, 29, posted a photo of them both in scrubs, apparently filming scenes for her Comedy Central series Inside Amy Schumer
‘Yesterday’s surgery went very well,’ he wrote in the caption.
See more of the latest on Amy Schumer as she reveals she has a dog with her boyfriend
Covered in blood: Amy, and boyfriend Ben were seen in this shot together dressed in scrubs in a photo he posted to Instagram on Tuesday
His day job is as a furniture designer.
The blonde comedienne wore blue scrubs while her furniture designer beau opted for green attire.
The 34-year-old actress had a huge grin across her face as she wore an eye patch over her left eye while an unlit cigar hung out of her mouth. A white medical face mask was draped around her neck.
Hanisch had a shocked expression while his face mask hung around his neck as well.
The couple was spotted out together on Thursday morning as Schumer bundled up in a winter coat but left her legs out in the cold to freeze.
Brrraving the cold! The couple was spotted out together on Thursday morning as Schumer bundled up in a winter coat but left her legs out in the cold to freeze
Leading lady: She hinted at a bit of cleavage in the black puffer coat as Hanisch followed behind, ever the gentleman
Leggy display: The Trainwreck star donned a knee-length pencil skirt, which showed off her legs and she wore fashionable snow ankle boots for the outing
She hinted at a bit of cleavage in the black puffer coat as Hanisch followed behind, ever the gentleman.
Her silky light locks were swept back into a high ponytail with a few whisps around her face for an added feminine touch.
The Trainwreck star donned a knee-length pencil skirt, which showed off her legs and she wore fashionable snow ankle boots for the outing.
The couple were also seen together on Wednesday morning as they appeared to be on a coffee run before heading to set in New York City.
Ben declared his devotion to the pretty blonde on Friday when he shared a black and white photo of her gazing out of an airplane window and the caption: 'When you find her, risk everything.'
Coffee run: The couple were pictured together on Wednesday morning as they walked through the New York City snow
